author: alja
body:
## Description
This PR fixes positioning of Phase -2 clusters in the Fireworks event display.
In the screenshot below clusters are rendered as blue point and a marker.

![strip-len](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2516492/167485982-a9b1e4d1-ceae-4ff7-b57f-838ba4b6445f.png)
title: Fireworks-master:  Fix position of phase2 clusters in 3D and projected views
